response.original_title: Jujutsu Kaisen: Hunger of the Cursed
response.overview: Follow Yuji Itadori as he embarks on a journey from becoming the host of a powerful curse to learning how to fight it and other curses alongside fellow students at Tokyo Jujutsu High School. 4D movie presented at the Kung Fu Panda Theater at Universal Studios Hollywood for the Fan Fest Nights event.
response.title: Jujutsu Kaisen: Hunger of the Cursed
